actions.name: Elemental Charge
actions.description: Effect: The chance of the user's Electric, Fire, and Ice Attacks to inflict @Affliction[paralysis], @Affliction[burn], and @Affliction[frostbite] respectively increase by 20% (@Affliction[frozen] is increased by 10%). This also applies to Tri Attack.

system.description: Effect: The chance of the user's Electric, Fire, and Ice Attacks to inflict @Affliction[paralysis], @Affliction[burn], and @Affliction[frostbite] respectively increase by 20% (@Affliction[frozen] is increased by 10%). This also applies to Tri Attack.
